section.title: companies, synchronizing of Synchronize Companies
section.para: The synchronize Companies utility is designed to synchronize a parent database with child databases for the purpose of consolidated financial reporting. This utility will only be visible when external Company consolidation is enabled—and then only when users have appropriate permissions.
To synchronize Companies, select the "Synchronize Companies" option. The following screen will appear:
When synchronizing Companies, you are presented with the following lists:

listitem.para: Select one or more financial periods to synchronize.
Select one or more external companies to synchronize.

section.para: The following buttons are unique to this screen:

listitem.para: Selects all the contents of the list above the button.
De-selects all the contents of the list above the button.
